com.btmatthews.atlas.core.domain.i18n

Class LocalizedBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.atlas.core.domain.i18n.LocalizedBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The value type.

    public final class LocalizedBuilder<T>
extends Object
    A builder for Localized objects that map Java locales to the locale-specific value.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalizedBuilder()
      Construct a builder that will be used to create a new Localized object from scratch.
      LocalizedBuilder(Localized<T> original)
      Construct a builder that will be used to modify an existing Localized object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Construct an immutable Localized object.

      Remove a locale specific value.

      Set a locale specific value.
